title: Who sang, 'Baby Baby Fallin’ in Love Again'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think maybe you mean “Fallin’ In Love,” by Hamilton, Joe Frank & Reynolds (1975):  Fallin' in Love (Hamilton, Joe Frank & Reynolds song) - Wikipedia

Hamilton, Joe Frank & Reynolds from the summer of 1975. This song was the trio’s second top 10 hit after “Don’t Pull Your Love” from the summer of 1971. Source: Joel Whitburn’s BillboardBook of Top 40 Hits.
